phone.desc: Enter your phone number to login

otp.title: OTP
otp.desc: A text has been sent to your number +92 $phone

baseContainer.processingDescription: Your payment is being processed, you may be redirected to a 3rd party to enter your OTP pin.

general_purpose.default: Are you sure you want to mark it as default payment method?
general_purpose.delete: Are you sure you want to delete?
general_purpose.address_delete: Are you sure you want to delete?

cart.title: Almost Done
cart.cvvDigitError: This field should be equal to 3 or 4 digits
cart.terms: By completing your order you agree to abide by bSecure’s Terms & Conditions
cart.termsDesc:
We’re constantly developing new technologies and features to improve our services. For example, we invest in artificial intelligence that uses machine learning to detect and block spam and malware, and to provide you with innovative features like simultaneous translations. As part of this continual improvement, we sometimes add or remove features and functionalities, increase or decrease limits to our services, and start offering new services or stop offering old ones. 
If we make material changes that negatively impact your use of our services or if we stop offering a service, we’ll provide you with reasonable advance notice and an opportunity to export your content from your bSecure Account using bSecure Checkout, except in urgent situations such as preventing abuse, responding to legal requirements or addressing security and operability issues.
cart.cnic: As per the requirements of Government of Pakistan, Please enter your National identity card number above

successScreen.title: Success
successScreen.bottomTitle: Please verify your account for faster order processing next time

permissionPopup.title: Continue with

permissionPopup.info: This website doesn’t recieve your payment details

checkoutFailureScreen.failureDesc: Your payment was unsuccessful, try again with some other method
checkoutFailureScreen.triesDesc: Your payment was not successful and you will be redirected back to the store
